text: Banting may refer to: * Banting, a town in Malaysia * Banting (state constituency), a state constituency in Malaysia * Frederick Banting (1891–1941), Canadian medical scientist, co-discoverer of insulin * William Banting (1797–1878), English undertaker, dietician (″Letter on Corpulence, Addressed to the Public (1863)″) ** ″Banting″, refers to a low-carbohydrate dieting method (emphasis on avoiding sugar, saccharine matter, starch, beer), and sometimes even to dieting in general, derived from the name of its inventor William Banting * Banting (crater), a lunar crater * Banting University, a fictional university in Degrassi: The Next Generation
title: Banting (disambiguation)
